oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pastor given new auto for Christmas, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about Reverend W. S. Marshall, “pastor of the West Nashville Cumberland Presbyterian Church takes his hat off to his friends and his church members who, on Christmas Day, presented him with a new 1940 ‘Ford DeLuxe … left to right front row: Supt. F. L. Estes, Mr. and Mrs. R. A. Elizer, Mrs. W. S. Marshall and the Rev. Marshall, Mr. and Mrs. Aubrey Murff, Miss Dora Travis, Ruth Marshall, and the Rev. Marshall’s little grandson, little Jim Hooker.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West Nashville Cumberland Presbyterian Church (Nashville, Tenn.)
